caption.title: Historical mean volumetric distribution and water cycle amplitude in salinity coordinates.
caption.p:
( a) Historical mean volumetric distribution of sea-water in salinity anomaly (with respect to the global mean salinity) space (m 3/pss; colours: CMIP5; black: En4 observations); Bars show the mean deviation of salinity ( W; pss). ( b) Historical mean P+R−E in sea surface salinity anomaly space (Sv/pss; colours: as in ( a); solid black: observations CORE2-Dai, dashed black: observations GPCP-OAFLUX-Dai). Bars show accumulated P+R−E up to the global mean salinity ( F
cycle ; Sv).
